meanings.definition: The beginning or start of something.
meanings.sent1: The commencements of the race were marked by a loud horn.
meanings.sent2: The commencements of a new school year bring excitement to students.
meanings.sent3: The commencements of the party were delayed by a surprise guest.
meanings.sent4: The commencements of a friendship can be as delicate as a flower blooming.
meanings.sent5: The commencements of a journey are always filled with anticipation.

meanings.definition: The act of starting or initiating something.
meanings.sent1: Her commencements of the project were met with enthusiasm from her team.
meanings.sent2: The commencements of a conversation can sometimes be awkward.
meanings.sent3: The commencements of a game show often involve a lot of cheering.
meanings.sent4: The commencements of a plan can determine its success.
meanings.sent5: The commencements of a song set the tone for the entire performance.
